title: Pasadena
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Geography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Geography) : [United States](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/United%20States) : [California](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/California) : Pasadena**

Home to the [Rose Parade](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/www.tournamentofroses.com/roseparade/), [Norton Simon Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/www.nortonsimon.org/) and a bevy of lovely [Craftsman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/www.ragtime.org/arch/Arch_Craft.html) style homes, including [Gamble House](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/www.gamblehouse.org/).

**[Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education):**  
 [Art Center College of Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Art%20Center%20College%20of%20Design)  
 [Armory Center for the Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/www.armoryarts.org/)

**[Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries):**

author: Ken Messenger
